name: [FOX] Find the difference
description:
Welcome! This is our first game made by one person.

We hope you like it.

The game will continue but we do not know when because we working on a new project.

We have that demo game you like. If you want you can go to profile us and see more of our games. Thanks in advance for playing our game and we wish you a nice day.

Music: The Rolling Stones Doom and Gloom
